thread.title_full: Akshay Kumar: It’s a wrap for Akshay Kumar’s 'Toilet – Ek Prem Katha' | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Akshay Kumar: It’s a wrap for Akshay Kumar’s 'Toilet – Ek Prem Katha' | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text:
After enthralling the audience as Ranjit Katyal ('Airlift'), Rustom Pavri ('Rustom') and Jolly Mishra ('Jolly LLB 2'), Akshay Kumar is all set for his next outing as Keshav in 'Toilet — Ek Prem Katha '.
The film, helmed by Shree Narayan Singh, has completed shoot. A unique love story set in the backdrop of the Swachh Bharat Mission, it has Bhumi Pednekar paired opposite the actor. The movie is shot in the heartland of India and revolves around Keshav and Jaya (Bhumi) fighting against the society's typical mindset.
'Toilet — Ek Prem Katha', produced by Aruna Bhatia and Plan C Studios in association with Abundantia, and presented by Viacom18 Motion Pictures and KriArj Entertainment, releases June 2.
Akshay Kumar shares a selfie with Bhumi from the 'Toilet' 00:20
